org.springframework.jms.support.converter
Class SimpleMessageConverter102

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.jms.support.converter.SimpleMessageConverter
      org.springframework.jms.support.converter.SimpleMessageConverter102
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageConverter
public class SimpleMessageConverter102
extends SimpleMessageConverter

A subclass of SimpleMessageConverter that uses the JMS 1.0.2 specification, rather than the JMS 1.1 methods used by SimpleMessageConverter itself. This class can be used for JMS 1.0.2 providers, offering the same functionality as SimpleMessageConverter does for JMS 1.1 providers.

The only difference to the default SimpleMessageConverter is that BytesMessage is handled differently: namely, without using the getBodyLength() method which has been introduced in JMS 1.1 and is therefore not available on a JMS 1.0.2 provider.

Since:
1.1.1
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
